table.name: ob_text
table.description: The order_base_text table associates an order base  to a particular set of text.  An order base can have more than one set of text, and the text can be shared by more than one order base.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The order base for which the fixed text is associated.

columns.name: TEXT_TEMPLATE_GID
columns.description: The foreign key to the text template table, in order to include fixed text with this order base.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_DEF_GID
columns.description: A document that should hold text.

columns.name: TEXT_OVERRIDE
columns.description: The transactional override for the template on the specific document.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
